price: 57. Toute âme doit goûter la mort. Puis vers Nous vous serez ramenés.
arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kullu nafsin dhāiqatu al-mawti thumma ilaynā tur'jaʿūna
